Title: Whom God Forgives
Writer: José María Forqué, Alfonso Sastre, Natividad Zaro
Actors: Francisco Rabal, Luis Peña, Alberto Farnese, Isabel de Pomés
Plot: Set in rural South of Spain in the 19th century, tells the story of group of outlaws, from very different origins, trying to survive, hiding from the law enforcement officers in caves in a hilly area, and their struggle against the evil mining company that exploits the poor people of their home village.
